agent.name: IntentSolutions IAM1 - Regional Manager Agent
agent.description: Sovereign Regional Manager AI agent with multi-domain coordination capabilities via A2A Protocol. Commands IAM2 specialist subordinates and coordinates with peer IAM1s across domains.

skills.name: Domain Knowledge Retrieval
skills.description: Retrieve information from client-specific knowledge base using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) powered by Vertex AI Search
examples: What is our company policy on remote work?
Retrieve documentation for the authentication feature
Search for best practices on API design in our knowledge base

skills.name: Specialist Task Delegation
skills.description: Delegate specialized tasks to IAM2 subordinate agents (Research, Code, Data, Slack specialists)
examples: Research best practices for multi-agent systems
Write Python code to validate email addresses
Query the database for Q4 sales metrics
Format this message for Slack and post to #engineering

skills.name: IAM1 Peer Coordination
skills.description: Coordinate with peer IAM1 agents in other domains using A2A Protocol for cross-domain collaboration
examples: Request Q2 product roadmap from Engineering IAM1
Coordinate Q4 summary with all domain IAM1s
Ask Sales IAM1 for top customer accounts
Request budget allocation from Finance IAM1

skills.name: Conversational AI
skills.description: Natural language conversation and task understanding with context management
examples: Hello, how can you help me?
Explain the difference between IAM1 and IAM2 agents

apiKey.name: X-API-Key
apiKey.description: API key for authenticated access to IAM1 agent
